Welcome! ¡Bienvenidos!
Cal State Fullerton's office of Parent and Family Relations is a team of dedicated staff that provide support, services, communication and event opportunities so you to be involved in your student’s college experience. An informed and supportive family plays an integral role in a student’s educational success. We will be here every step of the way to guide you.

Stay Connected



 Facebook



 Instagram












Membership
Join parents and family members who are involved with the university and remain active in their Titan’s experience at CSUF.

Learn more






Scholarship
Your undergraduate student can apply for one of the Titan Parent and Family Association scholarships in February.

Learn more






Giving
Your gift can be the catalyst for Titan-sized transformations, inspiring students’ paths, launching careers and improving lives.

Learn more













CSUF Spirit Gear
Show your Titan pride! Each purchase supports Titan Parent and Family Association scholarships and programming.

Give Now

 









Coronavirus Information for the CSUF Community
The campus is working closely with federal and state officials to ensure your student’s ongoing wellness at the university. In addition, we follow strict protocol, actively clean and reorganize the learning experience to ensure everyone’s safety. Stay up to date with the latest developments.

Learn More

Web Accessibility

			CSUF is committed to ensuring equal accessibility to our users.  Let us know about any accessibility problems you encounter using this website.
			We'll do our best to improve things and get you the information you need.
